line_2: Sigh'd wild, and loud as me.

line_1: Blazon'd with Signs of Gallic Heraldry;
line_2: In artful Piles around the Work shall lye;

line_1: Beyond the reach of Books or Heraldry?
line_2: Who shall the Impotence of Art supply,

line_1: Will shew the Force of British Heraldry:
line_2: Whose Union-Colours on the rolling Sea,
